name: SlAIm
description:
SlAIm Description

You are in a small region filled with various slimes with different abilities continuously trying to attack you. Luckily you have a gun helping you to defend against of the masses.

Slimes Currently there are 4 types of slime:
  1. Patrol
    simply tries attacking the player and tries healing itself when hurt badly
  2. Guard
    Groups around Chiefs and attacks the player when close enough.
    Heals the Chief when it's low and tries healing itself when hp is critical.
  3. Chief
    simply tries attacking the player and tries healing itself when hurt badly
    Has lots of HP and deals massive damage
  4. Healer
    Moves around randomly and creates large Puddles for slimes to heal with
    Has lots of HP, but doesn't intentionally attack
    Can Regenerate itself
Controls

WASD - move around
Mouse - look
Left click - fire
Escape - Pause

Project Background

This Project was originally created for university but turned out quite nicely. It can't really be described as "Game" since there is not much to do yet, but It might be extended in the future.
